#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define LL long long int
#define sc(x) scanf("%d",&x)
#define sl(x) scanf("%lld",&x)
#define pf(x) printf("%d\n",x)
#define pl(x) printf("%lld\n",x)
#define pb push_back
#define F first
#define S second
#define maxn 1005
#define M 1000000007
using namespace std;

int main()
{
	int t,n;
	LL ans;
	sc(t);
	while(t--)
	{
		sc(n);
		if(n&1)
		{
			ans=(n/2)*(n/2+1);
		}
		else
		{
			ans=0;
			ans+=n/2;
			n--;
			ans+=(n/2)*(n/2+1);
		}
		pl(ans);
	}
	return 0;
}
